name: api_editor_Editor
description: Derive from this base class to create a custom inspector or editor for your custom object.

properties.name: hasUnsavedChanges
properties.description: This property specifies whether the Editor prompts the user to save or discard unsaved changes befor

properties.name: saveChangesMessage
properties.description: The message that displays to the user if they are prompted to save.

properties.name: serializedObject
properties.description: A SerializedObject representing the object or objects being inspected.

properties.name: target
properties.description: The object being inspected.

properties.name: targets
properties.description: An array of all the object being inspected.

properties.name: CreateInspectorGUI
properties.description: Implement this method to make a custom UIElements inspector.

properties.name: CreatePreview
properties.description: Implement this method to make a custom UIElements inspector preview.

properties.name: DiscardChanges
properties.description: Discards unsaved changes to the contents of the editor.

properties.name: DrawDefaultInspector
properties.description: Draws the built-in Inspector.

properties.name: DrawHeader
properties.description: Call this function to draw the header of the editor.

properties.name: DrawPreview
properties.description: The first entry point for Preview Drawing.

properties.name: GetInfoString
properties.description: Implement this method to show asset information on top of the asset preview.

properties.name: GetPreviewTitle
properties.description: Override this method if you want to change the label of the Preview area.

properties.name: HasPreviewGUI
properties.description: Override this method in subclasses if you implement OnPreviewGUI.

properties.name: OnInspectorGUI
properties.description: Implement this function to make a custom inspector.

properties.name: OnInteractivePreviewGUI
properties.description: Implement to create your own interactive custom preview. Interactive custom previews are used in the

properties.name: OnPreviewGUI
properties.description: Creates a custom preview for the preview area of the Inspector, the headers of the primary Editor, a

properties.name: OnPreviewSettings
properties.description: Override this method if you want to show custom controls in the preview header.

properties.name: RenderStaticPreview
properties.description: Override this method if you want to render a static preview.

properties.name: Repaint
properties.description: Redraw any inspectors that shows this editor.
